GK22vidsripu:3378: prayogavyutpattau pratipadaviśeṣārthakathane prasattau gāmbhīrye rasavati ca vākyārthaghaṭane
GK22vidsripu:3379_0: agamyāyām anyair diśi pariṇateś cārthavacasor mataṃ ced asmākaṃ kavir amarasiṃho
GK22vidsripu:3379_1: vijayate śālikasya iyaṃ gaur uddāmā tava nibiḍabandhāpi hi kathaṃ na vaidarbhād anyat
GK22vidsripu:3380: avandhyā ca khyātā bhuvi katham agamyā kavivṛṣaiḥ kathaṃ vā pīyūṣaṃ sravati bahu dugdhāpi bahubhiḥ // VidSrk_50.28 *(1725) //.
GK22vidsripu:3381: śabdārṇavasya śailair bandhayati sma vānarahṛtair vālmīkir ambhonidhiṃ vyāsaḥ pārthaśarais tathāpi na tayor atyuktir udbhāvyate /
GK22vidsripu:3382: vāgarthau ca tulādhṛtāv iva tathāpy asmin nibandhān ayaṃ loko dūṣayati prasāritamukhas tubhyaṃ pratiṣṭhe namaḥ // VidSrk_50.29 *(1726) //.
GK22vidsripu:3383: dharmakīrteḥ hā kaṣṭaṃ kavicakramaulimaṇinā dakṣeṇa yan nekṣitaḥ śrīmān utpalarājadevanṛpatir vidyāvadhūvallabhaḥ /
GK22vidsripu:3384: tasyāpy arthijanaikarohaṇagirer lakṣmīr vṛthaivābhavad dakṣasyāsya na yena sundaragiraḥ karṇāvataṃsīkṛtāḥ dakṣasya yasya yathā vijñānaṃ tādṛk tasyeha hṛdayasadbhāvaḥ /*
GK22vidsripu:3385: unmīlati kavipuṅgavacane ca purāṇapuruṣe ca // VidSrk_50.31 *(1728) //*
GK22vidsripu:3386: vahati na puraḥ kaścit paścān na ko 'py anuyāti māṃ na ca navapadakṣuṇṇo mārgaḥ kathaṃ nv aham ekakaḥ /
GK22vidsripu:3387: bhavati viditaṃ pūrvavyūḍho 'dhunā khilatāṃ gataḥ sa khalu bahulo vāmaḥ
GK22vidsripu:3389: dharmakīrtipadānām vidyāvadhūm apariṇīya kulānurūpāṃ ślāghyāṃ sutām iva tataḥ śriyam aprasūya
GK22vidsripu:3390_0: tāṃ cārthine praṇayapeśalam apradāya dhik taṃ manuṣyapadam ātmani yaḥ prayuṅkte //
GK22vidsripu:3390_1: VidSrk_50.33 bhartṛhareḥ ye nāma kecid iha naḥ prathayanty avajñāṃ jānanti te kim
GK22vidsripu:3391: utpatsyate tu mama ko 'pi samānadharmā kālo hy ayaṃ niravadhir vipulā ca lakṣmīḥ // VidSrk_50.34 ceḥ|
GK22vidsripu:3392: nidhānaṃ vidyānāṃ kulagṛham apārasya yaśasaḥ śuci kṣmāpālānāṃ sucaritakathādarpaṇatalam /
GK22vidsripu:3393_0: kalāsampadratnavratativiṭapānāṃ surataruḥ prakṛtyā gambhīraḥ kavir iha saśabdo vijayate //
GK22vidsripu:3393_1: unnīto bhavabhūtinā pratidinaṃ bāṇe gate yaḥ purā yaś cīrṇaḥ kamalāyudhena suciraṃ
GK22vidsripu:3394: yaḥ śrīvākpatirājapādarajasāṃ samparkapūtaś ciraṃ diṣṭyā ślāghaguṇasya kasyacid asau mārgaḥ samunmīlati // VidSrk_50.36 *(1733) //.
GK22vidsripu:3396: viśrānto rasabhāgastimitayati yathā gabhīrimā ko 'pi // VidSrk_50.37
GK22vidsripu:3398: jihvāntaḥ kṛṣyamāṇeva na kavitve pragalbhate // VidSrk_50.38 *(1735) //
GK22vidsripu:3399: bāṇasya vālmīker mukulīkṛtaiva kavitā kaḥ stotum asty ādaro vaiyāsāni vacāṃsi bhāravigirāṃ bhūtaiva nirbhartsanā /
GK22vidsripu:3400: kāvyaṃ ced avataṃsabhūpam abhajad dharmāyaṇaṃ karṇayos tātaḥ kiṃ bahu varṇyate sa bhagavān vaidarbhagarbheśvaraḥ // VidSrk_50.39 *(1736) //.
GK22vidsripu:3401: dharmāśokasya vāmāṅgaṃ pṛthulastanastabakitaṃ yāvad bhavānīpater lakṣmīkaṇṭhahaṭhagrahavyasanitā yāvac ca doṣāṇāṃ hareḥ /
GK22vidsripu:3402: yāvac ca pratisāmasāraṇavidhivyagrau karau brahmaṇaḥ stheyāsuḥ śrutiśuktilehyamadhavas tāvat satāṃ sūktayaḥ // VidSrk_50.40 *(1737) //.
GK22vidsripu:3403: kīrtyā samaṃ tridivavāsam upasthitānāṃ martyāvatīrṇamarutām api satkavīnām
